title: Healthcare Practical Competency Enhancement: Elderly Relationship-Centered Nursing Education with Blended Learning-Based Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing skills and general understanding of geriatric healthcare
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Through VR simulations, learners can assess elderly patients' emotional needs and apply three or more empathetic response strategies
Learners can develop educational materials by applying core principles of relationship-centered care (e.g., respect, autonomy assurance) to real-world cases in blended learning environments
Through project-based assessments, learners can design and present one or more field-applicable scenarios to improve relationship-building with elderly patients
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
